title: Congratulations on 2 years!
content:
Congrats! All of those people were right!   
( [http://www.typophile.com/about/community.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019195337/http:/www.typophile.com/about/community.html))   
   
This site is a great resource and a great source of inspiration. I look forward to more articles and interviews (maybe you can swing Robert Bringhurst?), and posting my own work here for review, as soon as I can muster up the courage to face the big guns!
author: kraftie
